articles.title: Mets come from behind, win rubber match over Blue Jays - Reuters
articles.description: Pinch hitter Jeff McNeil's tie-breaking, two-run double capped a four-run sixth inning Sunday afternoon for the host New York Mets, who beat the Toronto Blue Jays 5-4 in the rubber game of a three-game interleague series.

articles.title: Rangers, F Brett Howden agree to one-year deal - Reuters
articles.description: The New York Rangers and restricted free agent forward Brett Howden agreed to a one-year deal on Friday.
